description: OpenCode Jupyter Integration - Production-grade Jupyter Notebook integration for OpenCode using jupyter-mcp-server.

userStories.title: Document OpenCode Configuration
userStories.description: As a developer, I want clear instructions on how to register the jupyter-mcp-server in opencode.json without the AI editing my files.
acceptanceCriteria: Create SETUP_INSTRUCTIONS.md
Provide JSON snippet for 'mcp' section in opencode.json
Document required JUPYTER_URL and JUPYTER_TOKEN env vars
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Design Data-Scientist Agent Profile
userStories.description: As a user, I want a specialized agent definition for Jupyter tasks provided as a template.
acceptanceCriteria: Create proposed agent JSON for oh-my-opencode.json
Specify tool filtering for 'jupyter_*'
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Implement Smart Error Mapping Middleware
userStories.description: As a user, I want actionable fix suggestions when Python code fails.
acceptanceCriteria: Create a script or middleware to intercept Jupyter tracebacks
Append fix suggestions for ModuleNotFoundError (e.g. 'uv add')
Append fix suggestions for package name mismatches (cv2 -> opencv-python)
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Implement Claude-Specific Tool Guidance
userStories.description: As an AI, I want metadata in tool returns to know the next logical step.
acceptanceCriteria: Wrap jupyter-mcp-server returns with 'claude_tip' and 'claude_next'
Tips explain result context (e.g. variable types)
Next suggests logical follow-ups (e.g. plotting)
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Integration Testing
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to verify the end-to-end flow works with real-time sync.
acceptanceCriteria: Verify notebook creation and cell insertion
Verify code execution with persistent state
Verify visual plot rendering in chat
Verify real-time sync with JupyterLab UI
Typecheck passes
